purpose: Verify that the DUT powers up cleanly and enters a defined steady state.
scope: Applies to all Rev A1 DUTs assembled with nominal component values.
setup: Connect DUT to adjustable DC supply and nominal resistive load. Configure oscilloscope to monitor V+, switch node, and gate drive.
procedure:
1. Set V+ to 0 V.
2. Arm oscilloscope.
3. Ramp V+ from 0 V to nominal operating voltage at 1 V/s.
4. Observe startup waveforms.
5. Repeat for three samples.
measurement: Capture startup waveforms on V+, switch node, and gate drive. Record any overshoot/undershoot and startup time.
acceptancecriteria: No abnormal oscillations. No voltage exceeds device absolute maximum ratings. DUT reaches steady state within 100 ms.

testpoints.name: Gate drive
testpoints.description: Gate drive waveform for GaN FET.

measurement_settings.other_settings: Ch1 on V+, Ch2 on SW_NODE, Ch3 on GATE.

acceptance_thresholds.notes: Time from V+ reaching 90% of nominal until outputs are stable.
